tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PrintingProgress (
    job_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    job_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    pages_printed INT,
    total_pages INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE job_progress (
    job_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    job_name VARCHAR(255),
    progress_status VARCHAR(50),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE JobProgress (id INT PRIMARY KEY, job_name VARCHAR(255), progress INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE PrinterStatus (printer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, status VARCHAR(255), timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE PrintQueue (queue_id INT PRIMARY KEY, job_id INT, position INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE JobHistory (history_id INT PRIMARY KEY, job_id INT, status VARCHAR(255), timestamp TIMESTAMP);
